typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFFlight
SFFlight derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FlightToSQL
